name: Sign Here: _________
description:
Good news! A company you work for has just been given a grant of $1 million!! All that's left now is for you to sign off on behalf of your company. Despite this, you aren't having such a great day at work.Gameplay:
Explore a silly office sandbox full of quirky pens, pencils, utensils, and puzzles. Find a way around your awful luck and sign that contract!

Just sign the contract already! Oh your pencil broke? No problem just sharpen it. Breeze blowing away your paper? Just close the- Hm, this pen isn't staying clicked maybe try a different- Woah this is a really interesting pen.Features:
Uncover a huge secret about your office.

Solve silly puzzles and discover wacky and strange ways to sign the contract.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
